comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
Wright Model B.  Parmelee was one of the most  famous American Aviators of 1910-1912 
Philip O. Parmelee  Aero Club of America Pilot # 25

comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content: Parmelee  was killed at North Yakima , Washington June 1,1912  Turbulent day -  sudden gust of wind-lost control of aircraft. Aircraft was built by Parmelee  and Clifford Turpin ( Aero Club of America Pilot # 22) Hall Scott engine
